attributes.action: Petition to remove John Bercow from the House of Commons.
attributes.background:
Surely under the present circumstances Bercow cannot be allowed to continue as speaker of the house.
That is intended to be a neutral position and he has clearly shown he is not neutral.
His position as speaker is now untenable to continue as speaker of the house.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs to be sacked.
